mapper.sql: id as id,qrcode_id as qrcodeId,wx_name as wxName,ch_code as chCode,openid as openid,focus_datetime as focusDatetime,unfocus_datetime as unfocusDatetime,focus_status as focusStatus,wx_acct as wxAcct

if.test: startIndex != null and startIndex >= 0 and pageSize != null and pageSize > 0

mapper.select:
select totalScan.wx_acct AS wxAcct, totalScan.wx_name AS wxName, totalScan.ch_code AS chCode, wc.ch_name AS chName, IFNULL(totalScan.value,0) AS totalScan, IFNULL(totalScanUser.value,0) AS totalScanUser, IFNULL(totalFocus.value,0) AS totalFocus, IFNULL(newFocus.value,0) AS newFocus, IFNULL(newFocus.value,0)-IFNULL(netaddFocus.value,0) AS lostFocus from
(SELECT wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code, COUNT(id) as value FROM wechat_qrcode_scan
AND wx_acct in
#{item}
AND ch_code = #{chCode} AND id = #{qrcodeId}
GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code) as totalScan
left join (SELECT totf.wx_acct AS wx_acct,totf.wx_name AS wx_name,totf.ch_code AS ch_code, COUNT(*) as value FROM
(SELECT wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code,openid, COUNT(id) as value
GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code,openid) totf GROUP BY totf.wx_acct,totf.wx_name,totf.ch_code ) as totalFocus ON totalScan.wx_acct = totalFocus.wx_acct AND totalScan.ch_code = totalFocus.ch_code
left join (select newadd.wx_acct AS wx_acct,newadd.wx_name AS wx_name,newadd.ch_code AS ch_code,COUNT(*) as value from (SELECT wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code,openid, COUNT(id) as value
and focus_datetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code,openid) newadd GROUP BY newadd.wx_acct,newadd.wx_name,newadd.ch_code ) as newFocus ON totalScan.wx_acct = newFocus.wx_acct AND totalScan.ch_code = newFocus.ch_code
LEFT JOIN (SELECT wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code, COUNT(id) as value
and focus_datetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and focus_status='0'
GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code) as netaddFocus ON totalScan.wx_acct = netaddFocus.wx_acct AND totalScan.ch_code = netaddFocus.ch_code
LEFT JOIN (SELECT wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code, COUNT(*) as value FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT USER_ID, wx_acct AS wx_acct,wx_name AS wx_name,ch_code AS ch_code FROM wechat_qrcode_scan GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code,USER_ID) AS qrcodeScan GROUP BY wx_acct,wx_name,ch_code) as totalScanUser ON totalScan.wx_acct = totalScanUser.wx_acct AND totalScan.ch_code = totalScanUser.ch_code
LEFT JOIN wechat_channel wc ON wc.id = totalScan.ch_code

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(focus_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time, COUNT(id) as value
and focus_datetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and focus_status='0'
GROUP BY time order by value desc limit 1

SELECT summaxnew.time as time, (IFNULL(summaxnew.value,0) - IFNULL(maxnetnew.value,0)) value from
(SELECT maxnew.time as time, count(*) as value from (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(focus_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time, openid,count(id) as value
and focus_datetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} AND wx_acct = #{wxAcct} AND ch_code = #{chCode} AND qrcode_id = #{qrcodeId}
GROUP BY time,openid ) maxnew group by maxnew.time ) summaxnew JOIN (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(focus_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d') as time, COUNT(id) as value
and focus_datetime between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and focus_status='0'
GROUP BY time ) maxnetnew on summaxnew.time = maxnetnew.time order by value desc limit 1
